Classes¶

class Signature(parameters=None, return_annotation)¶

An inspect.Signature subclass that represents a function’s parameter signature and return annotation.

Variables

  • parameters – An OrderedDict of parameter names mapped to Parameter instances

  • return_annotation – The annotation for the return value, or Signature.empty

empty¶

alias of inspect._empty

classmethod from_callable(callable_)¶

Returns a matching Signature instance for the given callable_.

Parameters

callable – A function or any other callable object

Returns

A corresponding Signature instance

classmethod from_signature(signature)¶

Creates a new Signature instance from an inspect.Signature instance.

Parameters

signature – An inspect.Signature instance

Returns

A new Signature instance

class Parameter(name=None, kind=<_ParameterKind.POSITIONAL_OR_KEYWORD: 1>, default, annotation)¶

An inspect.Parameter subclass that represents a function parameter.

Variables

  • name – The parameter’s name

  • kind – The parameter’s kind. See inspect.Parameter.kind for details.

  • default – The parameter’s default value or Parameter.empty

  • annotation – The parameter’s type annotation

property default_value¶

Synonym for Parameter.default.

empty¶

alias of inspect._empty

classmethod from_parameter(parameter)¶

Creates a new Parameter instance from an inspect.Parameter instance.

Parameters

parameter – An inspect.Parameter instance

Returns

A new Parameter instance
